Subjects: Christ, hymns to; hymns, to Christ
_description: The hymn ‘Verbum supernum prodiens’, by James Ryman — five quatrains (aabb) plus burden: ‘Verbum superuum prodieris / A patre olim exieris / Qui natus orbi subuenis / Cursu declini temporis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O sonne supernall procedingffro the fader sumtyme
                    goyng…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Also vnto the holy goostBothe thre & one of myghtes
                    moost
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 191-2.
